attributes.action: dissolve parliament and and do not allow existing MPs to seek re-election within the lifetime of the next parliament
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: this action is necessary by the awful behaviour of Members with regard to allowable expense.Her Majesty hopefully  has the authority to dissolve without awaiting a recommendation from the leader of the Government. Lord Tebbitt The former Tory chairman said the controversy over expenses did not discredit the Commons as an institution but the current generation of MPs.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
